Detailed Description

Provides new PLSqliteDatabase connections as per the PLDatabaseConnectionProvider protocol.

This class does no connection pooling, and should be combined with a generic connection pool implementation if pooling is required.

Thread Safety
Immutable and thread-safe. May be used from any thread.

Member Function Documentation
